WEB DESIGN

We'll create a website that'll forever effect the internet in 3 easy steps that'll only take 3 weeks*

Learn more Pricing

STEP 1: CHOOSE A WEBSITE FOUNDATION

STATIC SquareSpace
Free with zero website expenses $24-$36 monthly squarespace expense
Very fast and responsive loading speed Slightly slower than static
Add and edit blog posts and products You have complete control of the website and can edit entire website including adding new pages
Can list store products but cannot conduct payment transactions Can list store products and can conduct payments using squarespace
Summary:
Cheap and Fast		 Summary:
Can perform transactions and greater customization by you

Interested in SquareSpace? Find more details on it's features and pricing on their website. Note that the prices are in USD

Step 2: Plan Your Design

What do you want on your website?

Blog

Store Front

Gallery

Portfolio

We'll plan together to create your vision. Whatever you want, we got you.

Step 3: Sit back and let us do our work

Unless you ask us to do anything crazy, we'll create your website in two weeks. We'll have a meeting discussing changes and final touches. We'll also teach you how to easily edit the site yourself so your website can always be up to date.

Step 4: You have a website!

PRICING

Domain ~$15/year This is your unique url that you'll have to rent. I use namecheap because they have the best prices but Google Domains, Name.com, and GoDaddy are also good.
Our Fee $300 Our one time fee for creating your website and setting it up for you to easily customize it for the future.
SquareSpace (optional) $24-$36/month If you opt for a Squarespace this is their monthly fee
